fields.name: Ballpoint Pen Set
fields.description: Set of 5 high-quality ballpoint pens for everyday use. Smooth ink flow ensures effortless writing. Comfortable grip for long writing sessions. Ideal for students and professionals.
fields.key_features:
Set of 5 pens
Smooth ink flow
Comfortable grip
Durable body
Ideal for office and school
Multipurpose use

fields.title: Writes smoothly
fields.content: Ink flows well and pen feels comfortable in hand.

fields.title: Good value
fields.content: Affordable and works perfectly for daily writing.

fields.name: Gel Pen Set
fields.one_line_heading: Vibrant color gel pens for precise writing
fields.description: Set of 6 gel pens with smooth ink for clear and vibrant writing. Ideal for notes, journals, and creative work. Quick-drying ink prevents smudging.
fields.key_features:
Set of 6 pens
Vibrant ink colors
Smooth writing
Quick-drying
Comfortable grip
Durable barrel

fields.title: Very vibrant
fields.content: Colors are bright and ink flows nicely.

fields.name: Mechanical Pencil
fields.one_line_heading: Precision mechanical pencil for writing & drawing
fields.description: Durable mechanical pencil with smooth lead and comfortable grip. Ideal for drawing, sketching, or taking notes. Comes with extra 0.5mm leads.
fields.key_features:
0.5mm lead
Durable body
Comfortable grip
Refillable
Ideal for drawing and writing
Compact design

fields.title: Writes nicely
fields.content: Good grip and precise lead for detailed writing.

fields.title: Durable pencil
fields.content: Lead is smooth and refills easily.

fields.name: Fountain Pen
fields.one_line_heading: Elegant fountain pen for professional writing
fields.description: Premium fountain pen with smooth ink flow and classic design. Ideal for signatures, journaling, and gifting. Comfortable grip and refillable cartridge.
fields.key_features:
Smooth ink flow
Elegant design
Refillable cartridge
Comfortable grip
Durable metal body
Perfect for gifting

fields.title: Elegant pen
fields.content: Feels premium and writes very smoothly.

fields.title: Perfect gift
fields.content: Loved the design and smooth writing experience.

fields.one_line_heading: Bright neon highlighters for important notes
fields.description: Set of 5 neon highlighters with durable tips. Smooth ink flow for highlighting text clearly. Ideal for students and office use.

Ideal for office and school
Bright and clear

fields.title: Very bright

Refillable
Ergonomic grip
Durable design

fields.title: Professional look
fields.content: Perfect for office use and gifting.

fields.name: Calligraphy Pen Set
fields.description: Complete calligraphy pen set with 3 nibs and ink bottle. Ideal for artistic writing and creative projects. High-quality materials ensure smooth strokes.

3 nibs
Ink bottle included
Smooth strokes
Durable materials
For beginners and enthusiasts
Perfect for creative writing

fields.title: Great set
fields.content: Nibs are good quality, perfect for practice.

fields.title: Nice for beginners

fields.name: Permanent Marker Set

Bold colors
Permanent ink

Smudge-resistant
